In in Genoa, the stepfather of Domenico, Ottobono Salvago, vouches for the performance of the contract ... the act signed Â« in contracta nobilium Lomellinorum videlicet in carrubeo juxta logiam de Sopranis Â». This agreement mentioned is the act of the Portuguese notary Laurenzo of Ghimarelis written by his scribe Joao Gonzales, 23 June 1456 (the royal privilege of June 21); here the act is said to be Â« tracta seu apaltu coreorum Â». It should be noted that Scotto and Salvago are two families in the same albergo; the Scotti was appended to the Salvaghi...
